UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of peptides derived from olive flounder lipopolysaccharide binding protein/bactericidal permeability-increasing protein (LBP/BPI).
Literature.Author: Nam BH, Moon JY, Park EH, Kim YO, Kim DG, Kong HJ, Kim WJ, Jee YJ, An CM, Park NG, Seo JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MEC=1.4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis RM125(MEC=1.0µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 9341(MEC=5.3µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus RM4220(MEC=5.6µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MEC=1.3µg/ml),Escherichia coli KCTC 1116(MEC=1.7µg/ml),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MEC=0.8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 2004(MEC=6.4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium KCTC 2514(MEC=1.2µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila KCTC 2358(MEC=4.8µg/ml),Edwardsiella tarda H-4(MEC=125.0µg/ml),Streptococcus iniae FP5229(MEC=5.3µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus KCCM 41664(MEC=2.2µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=5.9µg/ml)
